std.io
Extensions on java.io.BufferedReader

extension functions on class java.io.BufferedReader
from package std.io

Function Summary
Unit foreachLine(block: (String) -> Unit)
           
Iterator<String> lineIterator()
           * Returns an iterator over each line. * Note the caller must close the underlying BufferedReader * when the iteration is finished; as the user may not complete the iteration loop (e.g. using a method like find() or any() on the iterator * may terminate the iteration early. *
* We suggest you try the method useLines() instead which closes the stream when the processing is complete.
<T> 
T
useLines(block: (Iterator<String>) -> T)

lineIterator


 Iterator<String> lineIterator()
* Returns an iterator over each line. * Note the caller must close the underlying BufferedReader * when the iteration is finished; as the user may not complete the iteration loop (e.g. using a method like find() or any() on the iterator * may terminate the iteration early. *
* We suggest you try the method useLines() instead which closes the stream when the processing is complete.
